
Naming Standards
=========================

A validation package for database table and column names, providing standardized classes for validating and managing table names, column headers, and variable lists.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

Contents
=========================

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2

   colname
   lists
   tablename
